Row.Text: A well-known gifted woman in St. Teresa's School for Girls, Yuni was granted the privilege to exclusively use the Ivory Tower, the old library tower of the school, for her intelligence unrivaled by students at her age. She discovered the fact that the world of Asteria she lived in was fundamentally artificial, but her theory was never seriously considered by Landosol academia. Failed to counter the false world solely, she dropped her research about the truth and chose to enjoy her adolescence. Yet she preserved her findings in her notebook, for showing her foresight at a proper time.
